column4: hi guys! acer aspire one user here. installed interpid. wifi was not working but i fixed it from a tutorial. then updated ubuntu packages and now wifi does not work again. any ideas on a fix?
okay. im curious - how people of subnotebooks (so with small screens) use to navigate large windows? is there something that helps seeing the buttons when a window cant be resized smaller?
man just tried re-installing the wifi driver  - does not help :(
